summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. B-155, for the improvement of Dock Place (formerly Park Place) in the former City of Ballard, now City of Seattle, from the west line of Ballard Avenue to the east line of Shilshole Avenue, by grubbing, grading, paving with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation and constructing cement sidewalks, and granite curbs on both sides of said street, between said points, under Ordinance No. 1235 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
